subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Midway through what could turn into his finest season, Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur leads the N.H.L. with eight shutouts, and his goals against average has dipped below 2.
snippet: Midway through what could turn into his finest season, Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur leads the N.H.L. with eight shutouts, and his goals against average has dipped below 2.
